system.availability: Harvest from captured or slain creatures, burned as incense or dissolved in amasec. After a dose suffer -20 to all Tests, and after 2d10 minutes slip into a feverish slumber filled with violent and vivid dreams for 1d10 hours (or 4d10 hours if drunk in amasec). Afterwards wake up to make a +10 Willpower Test (or -10 if Drunk in Amasec) or gain 1d5 Insanity Points from the experience.
